mapper.select: SELECT exam.OID AS oid, rpt.Report_ID AS reportId, reg.Modality AS modality, rpt.Positive AS positive, rpt.Report_Date AS reportDate FROM T_Pacs_Exam_Report rpt LEFT JOIN T_Pacs_Registration reg ON reg.OID = rpt.Registration_OID LEFT JOIN T_Pacs_Exam exam ON exam.OID = rpt.Exam_OID WHERE rpt.Report_Date BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
